metadata.title: CVE-2018-25012 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A heap-based buffer overflow was found in libwebp in versions before 1.0.1in GetLE24().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-25012` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwebp6 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebpdemux2 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebpmux3 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu0.18.04.1
webp - 0.6.1-2ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libwebp package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2ubuntu0.18.04.1').
